channel.title: [639] Dung xp for NPC
channel.description: Hello, In my server I am trying to make it where when you kill a specific npc you get dungeoneering xp from it. In the base I am using this already works for certain npcs, but I need to make a few more npcs give you dung xp when you kill them. And I can't find out where the other person edited the npc to grand dung xp. -Thanks
